title: Nokia Bitmap eye candy
content:
Tripped over these today, and thought you bitmap-heads might like seeing some tiny bitmap fonts in action:   
   
 ![nokia1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2839.gif) ![nokia2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2840.gif)  
   
 ![nokia3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2841.gif) ![nokia4](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2842.gif)  
   
 ![nokia5](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2843.gif) ![nokia6](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2844.gif)   
   
 ![nokia7](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2845.gif) ![nokia8](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2846.gif)  
   
 ![nokia9](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2847.gif) ![nokia10](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030623im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2848.gif)
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: These are great! Where'd you find them?

there are times when I wish I wasn't so busy   
these past few months. I could very well have   
missed this new evidence of Prince of Persia   
development! the type is great too, but life   
just wouldn't be the same without PoP!
